reviewText: I love these two programs because she shows us paintings that I don't think I've ever seen before!  Try them!
These lectures are classics.  I found one in a thrift store in Seattle and after watching it I wanted to get others.  Amazon has several.  Came on time as ordered.

This a Fantastic Lecture on Matisse by Rosamond Bernier who knew Matisse personally. I really enjoyed hearing her anecdotes and seeing the slide presentation, which shows a lot of lesser known works. This is a DVD for real Matisse aficionados. It is also a touching social documentation of a beautiful cultured woman in her prime, talking about a topic she loves so well. The content is fascinating, the way it is delivered is even more interesting.
